newsitem.title: USA: Prism names Earl Charles CFO.
newsitem.headline: Prism names Earl Charles CFO.

text.p: Prism Solutions Inc Thursday named Earl Charles to the post of chief financial officer, replacing Samuel Hedgpeth, who resigned as CFO and has been reassigned to handle special projects.
In a statement, the company said Charles becomes a member of the Prism executive staff and will report directly to Warren Weiss, president and CEO of Prism Solutions.

Charles was most recently vice president and chief financial officer of R2 Technology Inc, a medical imaging software company, where he was responsible for the company's finance, legal, MIS, human resources, facilities, contract and investor relations functions.
